summary: The Block's research analyst Mike Rogers hosts a panel discussion with leaders driving the growth of stablecoins across the digital asset space.
title: Taking stablecoins mainstream — Brought to you by GMO-Trust | Full Video
content: The Block’s research analyst Mike Rogers hosts a panel discussion with leaders driving the growth of stablecoins across the digital asset space.
View The Block Research’s latest report titled Stablecoins: Bridging the Network Gap Between Traditional Money and Digital Value
You can learn more about our panelists and watch the event in its entirety below:
Samuel Lim – Chief Compliance Officer, Binance
Marisa McKnight – Head of Product, Liquid
Ian McAfee – Co-founder and CEO, Shift Markets
Kurt Bierbower – SVP of Business Development, GMO-Trust
